column4: hello guys if any one ready to help me mail me tinithetiger@yahoo.com
generally we do the support in the channel, if you want a more static medium for help, look into the forums..
oh thanks friend.. what other stuffs i can get from chat

Your question is very general, but for the axis plugin, I know nothing about apache, but "aptitude search axis" will list a couple of packages that might be related, you could use "aptitude show packagename" to get more info for each..
